name: catching the train
description:
hey! there's no time to sit down, you've got a train to catch!...hey wait is that a 50% off sale????   

★ use the arrow keys to take a short walk around tomato town, talking to residents, completing useless tasks and maybe doing some shopping! let's just hope the train doesn't leave without you.

★ bitsy HD by fred bednarski

https://vonbednar.itch.io/bitsy-x2

https://twitter.com/FredBednarski

★ original bitsy by adam le doux

https://bitsy.org/

https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

https://twitter.com/adamledoux
